alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Thunderstorm outflow will impact portions of western Box Butte, Scotts Bluff, western Morrill, Banner and southeastern Sioux Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms with strong outflow winds along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Agate Bed National Monument to near Lake Alice to 7 miles west of Wildcat Hills Campground to 6 miles northeast of Albin. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Gering, Mitchell, Bridgeport, Bayard, Terrytown, Morrill, Minatare, Hemingford, Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area, Northport, Angora, Wildcat Hills Campground, Hubbard Hill, Harrisburg, Flahertys Corner, Lake Minatare, Lake Minatare Campground, Chimney Rock State Park and Agate Bed National Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Winds will arrive before initial rainfall.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
